亷字的基本解释

亷
lián
“廉”字异体。

亷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力鹽切，平鹽，來。］
亦作“亷1”。亦作“槏3”。“覝1”的今字。
(1)侧边。
(2)狭窄。
(3)棱角。亦指物体露出棱角；有棱角。
(4)比喻人的禀性方正，刚直。
(5)收敛。
(6)引申为逊让。
(7)不苟取，不贪。
(8)节俭；节省。
(9)少。
(10)指细小。参见“廉苫”。
(11)低廉，便宜。
(12)清，清亮。参见“廉均”、“廉制”。
(13)通“熑”。断裂。
(14)通“覝”。考察，查访。
(15)通“磏”。参见“廉監”。
(16)清朝官员除正俸外，别有养廉银，简称为“廉”。
(17)古算术开方法术语，边为廉。
(18)姓。战国赵有廉颇。见《史记·廉颇蔺相如列传》。

亷字的康熙字典解释

inexpensive
Basic explanation of words
inexpensive
lián
A variant of the word "lian".
inexpensive
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" cut salt with force, flat salt, come. ]
Also known as "Lian 1". Also known as "槏3". The present character of "覝1".
(1) Side.
(2) Narrowness.
(3) Edges and corners. It also means that the object has edges and corners; there are edges and corners.
(4) It is a metaphor for people's natural temperament to be square and upright.
(5) Convergence.
(6) Extended to Xunrang.
(7) Not greedy or greedy.
(8) Frugality; saving.
(9) Less.
(10) Refers to small. See "Lian Fu".
(11) Inexpensive and cheap.
(12) Clear and clear. See "Incorruptible" and "Incorruptible".
(13) Tong "熑". fracture.
(14) Through "覝". Investigation, investigation.
(15) Through "Xun". See "Integrity Supervisor".
(16) In addition to regular salaries, officials of the Qing dynasty also had silver for cultivating honesty, which was referred to as "incorruptible" for short.
(17) The terminology of ancient arithmetic development method is cheap.
(18) Last name. The Warring States Period Zhao Youlianpo. See "Historical Biography of Lian Po Lin Xiangru".
